title: Soured Cream Walnut Cake
ingredients: ['110g butter', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '250ml soured cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '120g chopped walnuts', '60g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
